pageProduct.name: Optrex Fresh Eyes Liquid Eye Wash Bath 110ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Optrex Eye Wash with Eye Bath enriched with natural plant extracts washes, soothes and cleanses with FlexiSeal Eye Bath.

Modern living (such as computer work and air conditioning), dust particles, pollen, grit, and smoke can damage the eyes' surface, leaving eyes feeling tired and uncomfortable.


Optrex Eye Wash:


- Washes away particles to cleanse the eye.


- Is specially desinged to soothe tired and uncomfortable eyes.


- Contains nature plant extracts.

Suitable For: Everyday use for Adults & Children

Size: 110mL

Warnings

For external use only.

PRECAUTIONS

Suitable to use in Children's eyes under adult supervision.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Remove contact lenses before use, allow at least 15 minutes before replacing them after use. If irritation persists seek medical advice. Discard used wash, do not return to the bottle. If the eye bath is likely to be used by more than one person, it is a sensible precaution to sterilise it by boiling it in water for 10 minutes.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26) or a doctor

Ingredients

Aqua, Hamamelis Virginia (Witch Hazel), Alcohol, Boric Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Borate, Benzalkonium Chloride.

Contains: Natural plant extracts

Directions

Adults and Children: Rinse the eye bath with product before use. Fill with Eye Wash until a third full. Bend head slightly forward, holding eye bath by its base. Place eye bath over your eye. Slowly raise your head, opening your eye so the Eye Wash freely flows over it. Gently rock your head from side to side for at least 30 seconds. Discard any Eye Wash left in the eye bath. Repeat steps 1-7 for your other eye.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Discard any unused product 28 days after opening. Do not use after expiry date.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C
